annonstext:
Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future.

At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

At ABB Process Industries we are offering a range of solutions within automation, electrification and digital solutions. The fourth industrial revolution is here and we at ABB have decided to be at the forefront of this new industrial era. 

 In the north of Sweden, we see a trend of expanding growth with mining automation, battery factories and data centers as emerging markets. To meet the demands, ABB have set high goals and a strong strategy with increased focus on digitalization and sustainability. 

 As the business is growing, we are now increasing our capacity in our Project Management Office by hiring Project Managers, with location in Umeå, Skellefteå, Luleå or Kiruna. 

As a Project Manager we offer you a strong developing position where you get the opportunity to work with the latest technology, develop your knowledge and be a part of a great team. You will be an important part of our initiative and work closely with our sales teams, translating customer challenges into solutions. If you are passionate about helping our customers to be more competitive and reduce their global footprint by setting new standard in the Swedish process industry, don’t hesitate to send in your application.

We truly believe that diversity makes us even better and welcome all applicants that can in any way contribute to broadening our diversity.

Your responsibilities

	Ensure projects are executed according to budgeted time, cost and scope/quality.
	Build a strong team around you, strive to show leadership and be courageous to change the status quo. 
	You will run several projects at the same time, in varying sizes.
	Some projects will need an agile approach and consultatively translate customer challenges to solutions, based on ABB portfolio.
	Live ABB’s core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.
	You will have a work that includes responsibility, variation, problem solving, technical challenges, highly skilled colleagues, and an exciting international workplace where sustainability, design and digitalization are in focus.

Your background

	A Bachelor engineering degree or preferably a Master´s degree, or equivalent. 
	Background in project management, preferably at least 3 years.
	Experience of running agile projects is merited.
	Project management in the process industry is merited.
	Sales and business experience are merited.
	You are results-oriented, strategic and have a structured approach to work. 
	Fluency in Swedish and English, written and spoken alike, is required.

More about us

Recruiting FIRSTNAME LASTNAME,  TELEPHONENO , will answer your questions about the position. Union representatives - Sveriges Ingenjörer: FIRSTNAME LASTNAME,  TELEPHONENO , Unionen: FIRSTNAME LASTNAME,  TELEPHONENO , Ledarna: FIRSTNAME LASTNAME,  TELEPHONENO . All other questions can be directed to Talent Recruiter, FIRSTNAME LASTNAME,  TELEPHONENO .

This role is varied, challenging and rewarding. Apply today and help us change the course of an entire industry. Welcome to apply the latest by March 31, 2021. Please note that selection is ongoing, and the position may be filled before the last day of application.

We look forward to receiving your application. If you want to discover more about ABB, take another look at our website www.abb.com.
